reviews.review: This is one of the best movies ever made. The comedy feels natural and not out of place. It also makes a different experience by making a movie about a villain (yes, this is actually Thanos's movie). It is also very dark, unpredictable and it has great writing. It is very well directed, the score is great, the actors are fantastic and don't even get me started on the special effects. It also gives most of the characters their own moment. This is the culmination of 10 years worth of movies, experiences and success. As I stated earlier, in my opinion this is one of the best movies ever made and anyone should watch it,
Loved it! can't wait for pt2!
One if my favourite films, period
OMG SO SO SO SO GOOD!!!!! I CAN'T BELIEVE THEY ENDED IT THE WAY THEY ENDED IT!!!!! I'M SO GLAD THERE'S GONNA BE ANOTHER ONE!!!!!
WOW ! what a trip ! Can`t wait for more

The action is amazing very fun and it all looks fantastic. The character team ups worked great made for really good humour.the story is really good and easy to follow does a good job pulling the heart strings with the deaths. thanos is scary and he feels like a threat every time he is on screen with the heroes it feels like they are all gonna die his motivation is understandable so you can almost get on his side he also looks great the black order is really cool they also feel like a threat.

Avengers Infinity War is incredible in every sense of the word. It delivers action packed adventures and some un-expected twists in the plot, the MCU has done it again with one of the best movies we have ever seen and not to mention the amazing special effects!
A spectacular culmination and introduction of a spectacular story

Delivering well on all expectations and even surpassing them, Infinity War tells an over-bloated comic-book story with such elegance and masterful impact that successfully combines all characters in the MCU as well as offering the best villain in the franchise to date. Fantastic action, great acting and characters, solid direction and humor, Infinity War is more than just another superhero film, it is an event to remember!

5/5 stars

My only gripe with this film is that the ending left me with a ton of questions that won't get answered untill next year when infinity war part 2 comes out. But other than that, I really enjoyed infinity war. The film did a great job balancing out the many characters that were in the film, and they were all just as great as they were in previous films, the action is plentiful, and a lot of fun to boot, and the film is very suspenseful and had me on the edge of my seat the whole time. It's definitely worth checking out. But it's very clear that it's part 1 of a 2 part film.
